qas.question: What is Adrian Moreira's job title?

answers.text: senior vice president for adult music

qas.question: For what company does Adrian Moreira work?
Who wrote, "In other words, AC stations are where pop songs go to die a very long death. Or, to optimists, to get a second life"?
Where was Corey Moss' article published?
When do adult contemporary stations begin to play Top 40 songs?

answers.text: after the hits had become established

context: A notable pattern that developed during the 2000s and 2010s has been for certain pop songs to have lengthy runs on AC charts, even after the songs have fallen off the Hot 100. Adrian Moreira, <a0_0>senior vice president for adult music<a0_0/> for <a1_0>RCA Music Group<a1_0/>, said, "We've seen a fairly tidal shift in what AC will play". Rather than emphasizing older songs, adult contemporary was playing many of the same songs as top 40 and adult top 40, but only <a4_0>after the hits had become established<a4_0/>. An article on <a3_0>MTV's website<a3_0/> by <a2_0>Corey Moss<a2_0/> describes this trend: "In other words, AC stations are where pop songs go to die a very long death. Or, to optimists, to get a second life."
